bug.question: I have six legs and can fly. I like to buzz around flowers. What am I?

hints.text: 💛 I make honey.
🐝 I live in a hive.
⚫ I have black and yellow stripes.

bug.question: I am small and red, and I have black spots on my back. Children think I bring good luck. What am I?

hints.text: 🐞 I am a type of beetle.
🟢 I live on plants.
🔴 I am often red.

bug.question: I march in a line and carry crumbs back to my home. What am I?

hints.text: 🐜 I live in a colony.
🍫 I like sweet things.
💪 I am very strong for my size.

bug.question: I hop around and eat plants. I have long back legs. What am I?

hints.text: 🟢 I am usually green.
🎶 I make a chirping sound.
🐸 I can jump very far, but I am not a frog

bug.question: I start as a caterpillar and then turn into something beautiful that flies. What am I?

hints.text: 🦋 I have colourful wings.
💐 I drink nectar from flowers.
🐛 I go through a big change called metamorphosis.

bug.question: I make a sticky web to catch my food. What am I?

hints.text: 🕷️ I have eight legs.
🕸️ My home is made of silk.
🪰 I trap flies in my web.

bug.question: I glow in the dark at night. What am I?

hints.text: 🔦 I use my light to attract a mate.
✨ I am a type of beetle.
🌳 You can often find me in a field

bug.question: I make a loud noise in the summer and live in trees. What am I?

hints.text: 🔊 Only males make this sound.
☀️ I am most active during the hottest part of the year.
🌳 I spend most of my life underground as a nymph.

bug.question: I can walk on water and have long, thin legs. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I create ripples on the water surface.
⛸️ My weight is distributed to allow me to glide.
🐟 I eat small insects that fall into the water.

bug.question: I eat wood and live in tunnels. I can cause damage to houses. What am I?

hints.text: 🪵 I am a type of insect that builds colonies
🏠 I can be found in wooden structures.
🐜 I am not an ant but I look like one

animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears. I love to eat peanuts. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐘 I'm a very large animal.
🥜 I use my nose to pick up my food.
💧 I can spray water with my nose.

animal.question: I say 'meow' and love to chase mice. I like to drink milk. What am I?

hints.text: 🐈 I am a common house pet.
🧶 I like to play with yarn.
🥛 I purr when I am happy.

animal.question: I bark and wag my tail. I love to play fetch. What am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I love to chew on bones.
🐕‍🦺 I am known as man's best friend.
🎾 I like to chase balls.

animal.question: I say 'Oink, oink!' and love to roll in mud. What animal am I?

hints.text: 🐷 I am often pink.
🥕 I like to eat vegetables.
🏠 I live on a farm.

animal.question: I have a long neck and spots. I eat leaves from tall trees. What am I?

hints.text: 🦒 I am the tallest mammal.
🌿 I like to eat acacia leaves.
🌍 I live in Africa.

animal.question: I roar and I am the king of the jungle. I have a big mane. What animal am I?

hints.text: 🦁 I am a type of big cat.
👑 I am very brave.
🥩 I eat meat.

animal.question: I swim in the ocean and have a big tail. I jump high in the air. What am I?

hints.text: 🐋 I'm a very big sea animal.
🐳 I breathe through a hole on my head.
🎶 I make singing sounds.

animal.question: I hop around and eat carrots. I have long ears. What animal am I?

hints.text: 🐇 I am a furry mammal.
🥕 I love to eat things from the garden
🌱 I like to live in grassy fields.

animal.question: I have black and white stripes. I look like a horse. What am I?

hints.text: 🦓 I live in Africa.
✨ My stripes are unique to each of us.
🌿 I eat grass.

animal.question: I fly at night and say 'Hoo, hoo'. I eat mice. What am I?

hints.text: 🦉 I am a bird of prey.
🌙 I hunt at night.
🌳 I live in the forest.
